title: Why React is better than handlebars
content: React allows you to dynamically loop through code, but handlebars requires you to refresh the entire page. Not cool!

title: My journey from zero to coding hero
content: Before joining this coding bootcamp, I knew very little about coding although I was already in the tech industry. Now I know a ton

title: Poll: Front-End or Back-end?
content: Many developers are full-stack developers, but if we are honest with ourselves, every developer has a favorite. Comment below if you prefer working on front-end or back-end code!
